name: ICMAT 2017 : 2017 2nd International Conference on Mechatronics and Automation Technology
content: ‚óèPublication &Indexing 1, All submissions will be peer reviewed by 2-3 experts. All the registered and presented papers will be published in Conference Proceeding, which will be indexed by SCOPUS, Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, CPCI and other academical databases. 2,Selected papers with extension can be recommended to publish in international journals. \*ICMAT 2016 conference papers has been Indexed by EI.
